page.title: 11PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: In the play-ground I play elastic. You need a piece of elastic and three people. You put the elastic around their ankles. The third person has to jump over and into the spaces without touching the elastic. Stage two is jumping onto the elastic. The third step is to put your feet under the elastic and jump over the second piece taking the first piece over it with your feet. Having crossed the elastic you step back separating the elastic, jump up and on to the first piece. Having successfully completed all the steps it is the turn of another child. British Bulldog is a game of chase in which there are two safe places to stand. Two people are on it. If they tag someone and say" British Bulldog", the tagged person is also on it. The game continues until everyone is caught.
